name: Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa
description: Situated in lush surroundings between Suvarnabhumi International Airport (BKK) and the city centre, Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa is the perfect starting point for discovery in Thailand. From Bangkok's modern nightlife to its ancient temples and palaces, fully immerse yourself in our culture. Sensory experiences are found throughout our five-star luxury resort in Bangkok, from visionary meeting rooms that encourage innovation to restaurants that delight the palate. For hours of leisure and entertainment, visit Explore Spa by Le Méridien, Summit Windmill Golf Club or our outdoor saltwater infinity pool. Delight in unexpected accommodation with your freestanding bathtub, glass-enclosed rain shower, or LM BED with an artistic rendering of a traditional Wai greeting. Every hotel room at our Bangkok luxury resort includes sweeping golf course views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony or terrace. Change your perspective at Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Chatrium Grand Bangkok
description: Situated a short walk from Siam BTS Station, Chatrium Grand Bangkok is an ideal base when in Bangkok. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a butler service. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including an executive floor, facial treatments and body treatments. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Chatrium Grand Bangkok offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each have tea and coffee making facilities, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international dishes at Savio and Mediterranean food at Casia. Each evening, guests can wind down in the lounge bar. Bangkok's attractions, including Siam Paragon, Siam Square and Centralworld, are within easy walking distance of Chatrium Grand Bangkok. It is also within walking distance of Big C and the Erawan Shrine.Revato

name: Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel
description: A minute’s walk from Ratchadamri Skytrain Station, Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a touch of Thai luxury in the city. The hotel features a spa, an outdoor pool and free parking. Rooms feature elegant touches of Thai culture, offering décor made of teak and Thai silk. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Grand, en suite bathrooms showcase elegantly carved wood furnishings. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Central World Plaza and Lumpini Park. Bumrungrad International Hospital is a 12-minute drive away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 25 km away. The Spa by MSpa provides the option of a spa suite with a private plunge pool and complimentary herbal tea and cookies. Guests can head for the health club which has a steam room and offers fitness classes. Younger guests can look forward to treats such as bedtime milk and cookies and a range of children’s toiletries. The hotel provides 9 restaurants and lounges including Italian cuisine and Japanese creations. Local Thai delights are featured at Spice Market while Mocha and Muffins serves a selection of cold cuts, sandwiches and fine wines. Aqua Lounge and The Terrace offer casual dining options.
